name: Hole Down
description:
Hole down puts us in the shoes of Bob, an office worker tired of his job, that ventures down a hole looking for riches.

Will he actually earn something? Will he ever make it back home?

*DISCLAIMER* 
The linux version wasn't tested because we don't have a computer with Linux. If you find any trouble, please let us know.

Controls:

START means space

A - D: Move left or right

S: Go Down

Q: Switch items

F: Grab Items

E: Use potion
